mapper.select: select dsv.id as dsv_id, dataset_id, dsv.owner_id, version_name as dsv_version_name, ds.dataset_name as ds_dataset_name, dsv.storage_auths as dsv_storage_auths, version_tag as dsv_version_tag, version_meta as dsv_version_meta, storage_path as dsv_storage_path, dsv.created_time as dsv_created_time, dsv.modified_time as dsv_modified_time from dataset_version as dsv, dataset_info as ds, job_dataset_version_rel as rel where rel.job_id = #{jobId} and rel.dataset_version_id = dsv.id and ds.id = dsv.dataset_id
